Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ARP-AC1  (adenoregulin-related peptide A. callidryas 1; UCLL1c; XXA; Ala-rich; Dermaseptin, natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretion, the red-eyed tree frog,Agalychnis callidryas, North America, Central America, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (90.91%) tofrog Dermaseptin-PD-2A:36%; K:18%, G:12%. GRAVY: 0.309; Mol Wt: 3141.71; Mol formula: C139H239N40O40S1; Mol ex coeff: 5550.Activity: Active against E. coli and M. luteus (zone inhibition, stronger than cecropin B).
Literature Information.Author: Wang L, Zhou M, McClelland A, Reilly A, Chen T, Gagliardo R, Walker B, Shaw C. 2008
Literature Information.Title: Novel dermaseptin, adenoregulin and caerin homologs from the Central American red-eyed leaf frog, Agalychnis callidryas, revealed by functional peptidomics of defensive skin secretion.
